select ci.id, ci.CommunityName as community_name, ci.type as type, su.username as originator, ci.Purpose as purpose, ci.ContactsNumber as contacts_number, ci.CreateDate as create_date, ci.UpdateDate as update_date from communityinformation ci left join sys_user su on ci.Originator = su.id
where ${ew.sqlSegment}
